00117 
00121     enum Flags
00122     {
00124         SHADER_DEFAULT      = 0,
00126         SHADER_LIGHTMAPPING = 1,
00128         SHADER_TWOSIDED     = 2,
00130         SHADER_MASK         = 0xFFFF,
00131     };
00132 
00140     class Begin
00141     {
00142     public:
00147         explicit Begin( Shader* shader )            : m_shader(shader) {m_passes=shader->begin();}
00148 
00153         ~Begin()                                    {m_shader->end();}
00154 
00158         int     passes() const                      {return m_passes;}
00159 
00160     private:
00161         Shader* m_shader;
00162         int     m_passes;
00163     };
00164 
00172     class Pass
00173     {
00174     public:
00179         Pass( Shader* shader, int pass )            : m_shader(shader) {shader->beginPass(pass);}
00180 
00185         ~Pass()                                     {m_shader->endPass();}
00186 
00187     private:
00188         Shader* m_shader;
00189     };
